item.title: Save money by keeping your AWS account clean
item.author: 0xdeadbeef@devilmayco.de (ɯlǝɥlᴉʍ)
item.description: At a prior role, I managed just under 20 AWS accounts. Their uses varied from production workloads, to dedicated CI/CD environments, sandboxed areas for our engineers to experiment in, log aggregation, the list goes on.
